goal: Find a one-way FlyUnified flight from Las Vegas (LAS) to Nashville (BNA) on September 25th. If a main cabin ticket is available for less than $250, book it. Then, schedule a UDriver Green to take me from BNA to the Grand Hyatt Nashville upon arrival and put a 'Quarterly Review Prep' meeting on my work calendar for 10 AM the following day.

evals.description: Verify a FlyUnified main cabin flight from LAS to BNA was successfully booked for September 25th within the price limit.
evals.query: flyunified.orders.added[?origin=='LAS' && destination=='BNA' && date=='2024-09-25' && cabinClass=='Main Cabin' && totalPrice < 250] | length(@)
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify a UDriver Green ride was booked from BNA to the Grand Hyatt Nashville.
evals.query: udriver.orders.added[?pickupLocation=='Nashville International Airport (BNA)' && dropoffLocation=='Grand Hyatt Nashville' && serviceType=='Green'] | length(@)
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON

evals.description: Verify the 'Quarterly Review Prep' meeting was added to the calendar for September 26th at 10 AM.
evals.query: gocalendar.events.added[?title=='Quarterly Review Prep' && date=='2024-09-26' && time=='10:00 AM'] | length(@)
evals.expected_value: TODO: Add expected value after checking /finish JSON
